alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 13 at 1:12PM MST until December 15 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible in the highest elevations. Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph in lower elevation areas. * WHERE...Bighorn Mountains Southeast and Southern Johnson County. This includes Interstate 25. * WHEN...From late tonight through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County
